fulltext:
Contact
Huy Pham
0902918758  (Mobile) huypham.texas@gmail.com
Head of Data Science - open for new opportunity
Vietnam
www.linkedin.com/in/harriepham (LinkedIn)
Summary
I have more than 7 years of experience in data insights, data
products, business analytics associated data analytics, reporting,
information delivery,  data preparations, data exploration, and data
warehousing in the US and South East Asia countries in FMCGs,
Ecommerce, Retailing, Pharmaceuticals industries including:
- Data Science, Analytics & BI team building and coaching expertise
- Data-driven Digital Marketing: data optimization, conversion rate,
predictive scoring;
- Developing custom optimization algorithms to maximize efficiency
and profitability; 
- Implementing bespoke customer segmentation models to
personalize marketing and products
- Using customer life-cycle modeling to improve customer
acquisition, retention, and engagement
- Drawing on inferential and predictive statistics to analyze
experiments and complex causal systems
- Build, design and run tools analyses using statistical programming
languages: R, Python, SAS, SPSS and Tableau.
- Consulting role as Data Protection Officer (DPO) advises
organizations on best practice to ensure compliance with EU GDPR.
Areas Expertise:
Forensic Data Analytics, eDiscovery, Business Intelligence, Data
Mining, Machine Learning, AI, Big Data Analytics, Data Visualization,
Data Warehousing, Marketing Analytics, GDPR Assessment.
Applications Expertise: 
SAP ERP, Oracle EBS Hyperion, Microsoft Navision, CRM
Salesforce, Tableau, Spotfire, Qlik, Power BI, Domo, R, Python,
SQL, MS Azure ML, SAS, Cognos, Dataiku, DataRobot, Relativity,
Intella, Nuix, MixPanel, Heap Analytics, KissMetrics, Google
Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Google Ad, Hotjar,
Crazy Egg
Top Skills
Strategic Planning
Human Resources
Project Management
Languages
English (Professional Working)
Vietnamese (Native or Bilingual)
Spanish  (Elementary)
Certifications
● EXIN Lean IT
● Microsoft Operations Framework
● CompTIA Network+ Certified
● CompTIA Project+ Certified
● CompTIA Advanced Security
Practitioner (CASP)
Honors-Awards
Delta Mu Delta - International Honor
Society in Business Administration
National Society of Leadership and
Success
Page 1 of 6
Data Platforms: Informatica, Teradata, Holistics, Supermetrics,
Looker
Qualifications:
- Tableau Certified Professional
- Certified Analytics Professional (CAP)
- Datacamp Data Scientist with R & Python
- Udemy Data Science A-Z: Real Life Data Science
- Udemy Blockchain A-Z: Learn How To Build Your First Blockchain
Experience
Appable
Head of Data Science
October 2017 - Present 
- Data Science, Business Intelligence and Analytics: Transforming data
into business results, data becomes the key driver for company growth and
competitiveness
- Developing custom optimization algorithms to maximize efficiency and
profitability; 
- Implementing bespoke customer segmentation models to personalize
marketing and products;
- Using customer lifecycle modeling to improve customer acquisition, retention,
and engagement; 
- Drawing on inferential and predictive statistics to analyze experiments and
complex causal systems; 
- Build, design and run tools analyses using statistical programming
languages: R, Python, SAS, SPSS and Tableau.
- Leveraging predictive analytics to identify challenges and opportunities
before they occur.
- Drive the creation and implementation of best practices for data modelling,
analysis, and machine learning; data exploration and reporting tools; and
processes that allow data team to work efficiently within the product and the
tech organisation
- Define the overarching data strategy and vision for data pipeline, data
products
- Work closely with product management, product marketing, user-acquisition
and development teams to ensure priorities and roadmap are aligned across
the organisation
Page 2 of 6
- Big data, Data modeling, Data mining, Data visualization, Data warehousing,
Extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL), Statistical software, Business
intelligence, Business solutions, Cloud solutions, Product development,
Product management, Software development principles, etc.
THP Group
Senior Data Engineering Lead
June 2016 - October 2017 (1 year 5 months)
Vietnam
- Design and implement fault-tolerant data pipelines to integrate large amounts
of data from many diverse storage systems
- Building data team data analyst, data engineer, and data scientist
- Promote a culture of self-serve data analytics by minimizing technical barriers
to data access and understanding.
- Execute complex data engineering projects that have a significant impact on
business.
- Share knowledge by clearly articulating results and ideas to customers,
managers, and key decision makers.
- Stay current with the latest research and technology and communicate your
knowledge throughout the enterprise
- Take responsibility for preparing data for analysis and provide critical
feedback on issues of data integrity
- Experience knowledge of accounting, fraud, bribery and corruption or sector
specific knowledge or experience
- Relational databases, e.g. SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL;
- Data visualisation software Spotfire, Tableau, or Qlik;
- Statistical techniques (regression, clustering, linear regression, etc.);
- Supervised predictive modelling (machine learning, genetic programming);
- Unsupervised pattern detection (Bayesian inference, compression neural
networks);
- Data analytics from enterprise systems application such as SAP, HRMS,
DMS, etc.
EY
Manager - Forensic Data Analytics
July 2015 - June 2016 (1 year)
Philippines
Forensic Data Analytics
• Anti-bribery/anti-corruption (ABAC) analytics
• Anti-fraud analytics
Page 3 of 6
• Risk assessment
• Dispute and damage analysis
• Predictive modeling
eDiscovery
• Preservation and collection of ESI
• Computer forensics, data mining and analysis
• Early case assessment
• Technology assisted review
• Managed document review
• Information governance
• eDiscovery advisory services
- Experience in data modeling (ER models) primarily for data warehousing
purposes, with emphasis on dimensional schemas. Ideally, you must have
gone through at least one full life cycle implementation.
- Ability to design and implement reporting solutions in at least one of leading
Business Intelligence packages (e.g. Oracle OBIEE, IBM Cognos, SAP
Business Objects, MicroStrategy, QlikView, etc.).
- Hands-on experience in using leading Data Visualization packages (e.g.
Tibco Spotfire, Tableau, etc.) for producing enaging and useful insights.
- Experience with investigating and handling data quality issues.
- Building data team data analyst, data engineer, and BI consultants
PwC
Senior Consultant - Forensic Data Analytics & Risk Consulting
January 2014 - June 2015 (1 year 6 months)
Thailand
Forensic Technology services includes:
• Forensic data analytics
• E-Discovery response
• Information risk management
• Cyber crime and data breach investigations
Risk Consulting services includes:
• Enterprise Risk Management (ERM)
• Privacy and data protection
• Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC)
- SQL, relational databases and NoSQL databases;
Page 4 of 6
- Data modeling and data mapping;
- Data integration tools (e.g. Talend, SnapLogic, Informatica) and data
warehousing / data lake tools;
- Relational SQL, distributed SQL and NoSQL databases:
- MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.
- MemSQL, CrateDB, MongoDB, Cassandra
- Neo4j, AllegroGraph, ArangoDB
- Data integration tools such as Talend, Informatica, SnapLogic
- Data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow
- Business Intelligence tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik, Domo, Google
Data Studio
- Cloud technologies such as SaaS, IaaS and PaaS within Azure, AWS or
Google;
- Data mining and statistical analysis tools such as R, SAS …etc.
- Reverse engineering or deep technical knowledge of ERP systems and other
datasets
- Extraction, cleansing and analysis of ERP data from a range of leading
vendors such as Oracle, SAP and JD Edwards
- Thorough experience identifying and addressing client needs: developing
and sustaining deep client relationships using networking, negotiation and
persuasion skills to identify and sell potential new service opportunities;
preparing and presenting complex written and verbal materials; and defining
resource requirements, project workflow, budgets, billing and collection; and,
- Thorough experience as a team leader: leading teams to generate a
vision, establish direction and motivate members, create an atmosphere of
trust, leverage diverse views, coach staff, and encourage improvement and
innovation.
- Presenting technical and non-technical information to various audiences;
Rackspace
Senior IT Auditor Specialist
April 2012 - November 2013 (1 year 8 months)
San Antonio, Texas Area
Education
University of Texas - Incarnate Word
Master of Science  /  Bachelor of Business Administration, Accounting and
Finance, Management Information System · (2007 - 2013)
Page 5 of 6
University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA)
Certified Financial Planner (CFP®) Education Program, Financial
Planning · (2011 - 2012)
Association of Certified Fraud Examiners (ACFE)
Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE) Credential, Fraud Examination · (2012 - 2013)
The Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA)
Certified Internal Auditor (CIA), Certified Financial Services Auditor
(CFSA), Certification in Control Self-Assessment (CCSA) · (2012 - 2013)
Information Systems Audit and Control Association® (ISACA)
Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified Information
Security Manager (CISM), Certified in the Governance of Enterprise IT
(CGEIT) · (2012 - 2014)
Page 6 of 6
